synopsis.text: One year before the start of the main story, the disciplined Kujaku Nijou joins the Special 7 team. Initially met with skepticism, Nijou must prove his worth on his first case with the group. When a file surfaces showing Nijou being held for questioning, his new teammates are left to wonder - what events could have possibly brought their upright new member under suspicion? This prequel story promises drama and insight into Nijou's past, enticing viewers with the chance to see the making of an exceptional investigator and a formidable team.
